data.title: Pretty 'n' Pink Sponsor — Sisters HOPE
data.text:
Sisters HOPE is a non-profit 501(c)(3) charity. Our funding comes from generous financial contributions from individuals and businesses. All donations we receive go toward funding the HOPE Retreat for women with breast cancer.

A sponsorship supporting our Pretty ‘n’ Pink Fashion Show gives recognition of your contribution and advertising in our program, and also recognition at Pretty ‘n’ Pink by our event Emcee. For your contribution, guest tickets for our luncheon are included as well as special VIP seating. Please reference the Sponsorship Opportunities sheet below for details of all the benefits available to you or your business when sponsoring a Pretty ‘n’ Pink Fashion Show.

Giving at any level or amount enables us the opportunity to affect the lives of our Retreat Participants for the better. Each and every HOPE Retreat is made possible by generous contributions from our supporters.

Please complete the Sponsorship Contact Interest form or email Sisters HOPE at sponsorship@sistershope.org to coordinate your

Pretty ‘n’ Pink Sponsorship.
